title: Guests at wedding shower for Barbara Peace and Arnie Sowell, seated from left: two unknowns, Harriet Reid, unknown, Carrie Clanton, Justine Robinson; standing: Carmenita Austin, Edyth or Edythe Schraeder, Edith Venable, Myrna Davis, LeeBrun Johnson, Barbara Peace, Carrie Warley, possibly Otella Johnson Twyman, Joan Bolden, unknown, Evelyn Johnson, and Geraldine Reynolds (unknowns are possibly Doris Finney, Vernicia Mitchell, Naomi Thomas, Mildred Wallace, or Patty Curry) posed around table with gifts and umbrella decoration, in home of LeeBrun Johnson, Kelly Street
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
